text: aur agar naapharamaanon ke paas rooe zameen kee saaree kaenaat mil jaeg balki unake saath utanee hee aur bhee ho to qayaamat ke din ye log yaqeenan sakht azaab ka fidaya de nikalen (aur apana chhutakaara karaana chaahen) aur (us vakt) unake saamane khuda kee taraph se vah baat pesh aaegee jisaka unhen vaham va gumaan bhee na tha
